title: Appointment Setter
job_overview:
About Us
Legend Vocal Academy is a premium vocal training institution co-founded by world-renowned artist Kim Burrell. We work with rising vocalists, professionals, and performers seeking transformative vocal mastery. We're now expanding our enrollment team and are seeking a driven Appointment Setter who thrives in fast-paced, goal-oriented environments.

Responsibilities
• ? Lead Generation & Qualification: Research, identify, and pre-qualify prospective students who align with our premium offerings.
• ? Appointment Setting: Book discovery calls between interested prospects and our Enrollment Advisors (Closers).
• ? Relationship Management: Nurture leads through email, DMs, phone, and follow-ups. Keep our CRM updated.
• ? Collaboration: Work closely with closers and marketing to ensure qualified leads are efficiently funneled.

What We’re Looking For
• ???? Fluent English speaker with clear, confident, and articulate communication skills
• ???? Self-motivated and driven — you don’t wait to be told what to do
• ?? Fast, efficient, and organized in managing conversations and follow-ups
• ???? High energy, great attitude, and exceptional listening skills
• ???? Ability to handle objections and redirect conversations smoothly
• ???? Experience working with CRM tools, online calendars, and lead sheets is a plus
• ???? Comfortable working remotely and meeting daily/weekly KPIs
